name: azurekeyvaultactions
description: Task to perform specific actions on the Azure Key Vault
author: Maik van der Gaag

inputs.name: ConnectedServiceName
inputs.label: Azure RM Subscription
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the Azure Resource Manager subscription for the deployment.

inputs.name: Action
inputs.label: Action
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the action you would like to perform (Add or Remove)

inputs.name: KeyVaultName
inputs.label: Azure Key Vault Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the Azure Key Vault

inputs.name: SecretName
inputs.label: Secret name
inputs.visibleRule: Action = SetSecret || Action = GetSecret || Action = RemoveSecret

inputs.name: CertificateName
inputs.label: The name of the certificate name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name for or of the certificate in the Azure Key Vault

inputs.name: ObjectId
inputs.label: ObjectId
inputs.helpMarkDown: The objectid of the object to give access to

inputs.name: PermissionsToKeys
inputs.label: Permissions to keys (',' separated)
inputs.helpMarkDown: The required permission to keys - possible options: decrypt,encrypt,unwrapKey,wrapKey,verify,sign,get,list,update,create,import,delete,backup,restore,recover,purge

inputs.name: PermissionsToSecrets
inputs.label: Permissions to secrets (',' separated)
inputs.helpMarkDown: The required permission to secrets - possible options: get,list,set,delete,backup,restore,recover,purge

inputs.name: PermissionsToCertificates
inputs.label: Permissions to certificates (',' separated)
inputs.helpMarkDown: The required permission to certificates - possible options: get,list,delete,create,import,update,managecontacts,getissuers,listissuers,setissuers,deleteissuers,manageissuers,recover,purge,backup,restore

inputs.name: PermissionsToStorage
inputs.label: Permissions to storage (',' separated)
inputs.helpMarkDown: The required permission to keys - possible options: get,list,delete,set,update,regeneratekey,getsas,listsas,deletesas,setsas,recover,backup,restore,purge

inputs.name: VariableName
inputs.label: Variable name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The variable name to save the result
inputs.visibleRule: Action = GetSecret || Action = ImportCertificate || Action = GetCertificateUri || Action = SetSecret
